fullText: This revival of the 1968 musical by Burt Bacharach, Hal David and Neil Simon feels both faithful to its source and bracingly contemporary.
dtliExcerpt: This revival of the 1968 musical by Burt Bacharach, Hal David and Neil Simon feels both faithful to its source and bracingly contemporary.
bwwExcerpt: "...comes fully to life only briefly, at the  beginning of its second act,  when a comic volcano named Katie Finneran  erupts into molten hilarity.  Otherwise the white-hot charms this  musical is said to have once  possessed are left sleeping."
showScoreExcerpt: This revival of the 1968 musical by Burt Bacharach, Hal David and Neil Simon feels both faithful to its source and bracingly contemporary.
